10400.name: Icarus Heavy Arms Piece
10400.description: An essential ingredient that a Dwarf needs to make Icarus Heavy Arms. It can be sold to public stores.

10401.name: Icarus Trident Piece
10401.description: An essential ingredient that a Dwarf needs to make Icarus Trident. It can be sold to public stores.

10402.name: Icarus Hammer Piece
10402.description: An essential ingredient that a Dwarf needs to make Icarus Hammer. It can be sold to public stores.

10403.name: Icarus Hand Piece
10403.description: An essential ingredient that a Dwarf needs to make Icarus Hand. It can be sold to public stores.

10404.name: Icarus Hall Piece
10404.description: An essential ingredient that a Dwarf needs to make Icarus Hall. It can be sold to public stores.

10405.name: Icarus Spitter Piece
10405.description: An essential ingredient that a Dwarf needs to make Icarus Spitter. It can be sold to public stores.

10406.name: Icarus Stinger Piece
10406.description: An essential ingredient that a Dwarf needs to make Icarus Stinger. It can be sold to public stores.

10407.name: Icarus Wingblade Piece
10407.description: An essential ingredient that a Dwarf needs to make Icarus Wingblade. It can be sold to public stores.

10408.name: Old Agathion
10408.description: Old Agathion with the spirit's seal unbound. Double-click to unlock items. Old Agathion

10409.name: A Bottle of Souls
10409.description: A bottle that holds 5 Souls. Double-click to fill the bottle. For Kamael use only. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Bottle of Empty Soul

10410.name: Full Bottle of Souls - 5 Souls
10410.description: A bottle containing 5 Souls. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Kamael Exclusive Weapon. Disappears without effect if used by other races. Bottle of Full Soul

10411.name: Full Bottle of Souls - 5 Souls (For Combat)
10411.description: A bottle containing 5 Souls. Usable only in combat. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Kamael Exclusive Weapon. Disappears without effect if used by other races. Bottle of Full Soul

10412.name: Full Bottle of Souls - 10 Souls
10412.description: A bottle containing 10 Souls. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Kamael exclusive item. Disappears without effect if used by other races.

10413.name: Dynastic Essence II
10413.description: An item that can modify Dynasty Tunic. Powerful options are available for a modified Dynasty Tunic. Grants more powerful options than Dynastic Essence.

10415.name: Icarus Dual Sword
10415.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. of dual-swords, two-handed swords, two-handed blunt weapons and fist weapons will increase more than that of one-handed swords. When enchanted to 4 or more, increases Critical Attack by 109, and Max HP increases by 10%. Increases the damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

10416.name: Blue Talisman - Explosion
10416.description: Increases P. Atk./Atk. Spd. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be exchanged or dropped. Blue Talisman of Explosion

10417.name: Blue Talisman - Magic Explosion
10417.description: Increases M. Atk. and M. Critical Rate . Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be exchanged or dropped. Blue Talisman of Magic Explosive Power

10418.name: White Talisman - Storm
10418.description: Increases Wind attribute. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be exchanged or dropped. White Talisman of Storm

10419.name: White Talisman - Darkness
10419.description: Increases Dark attribute. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be exchanged or dropped. White Talisman of Darkness

10420.name: White Talisman - Water
10420.description: Increases Water attribute. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be exchanged or dropped. White Talisman of Water

10421.name: White Talisman - Fire
10421.description: Instantly increases fire elemental. Only one effect is applied when you wear the same two talismans. Projection Weapons with no exchange/drop available White Talisman of Fire

10422.name: White Talisman - Light
10422.description: Increases holy attribute. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be exchanged or dropped. White Talisman of Light

10423.name: Blue Talisman - Self-Destruction
10423.description: Damages a nearby enemy with a powerful explosion. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be exchanged or dropped. Blue Talisman of Self destruction

10424.name: Blue Talisman - Greater Healing
10424.description: Increases heal power. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be exchanged or dropped. Blue Talisman of Great Healing

10425.name: Improved Baby Pet Food
10425.description: Automatically consumed when an improved baby pet's hunger gauge drops below 55%. H5 Price Evolving Wolf's Food

10426.name: Fenrir Necklace
10426.description: A necklace that can summon a Fenrir. It takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns. Wolf's Necklace

10427.name: Tully's Platinum Medal
10427.description: Small, shiny platinum medal. It reads, 'Permission No.1 for Group Admission to Special Workshop'.

10428.name: Tully's Tin Medal
10428.description: Small, shiny tin medal. It reads, 'Permission No.2 for Group Admission to Special Workshop'.

10429.name: Tully's Lead Medal
10429.description: Small, shiny lead medal. It reads, 'Permission No.3 for Group Admission to Special Workshop'.

10430.name: Tully's Zinc Medal
10430.description: Small, shiny zinc medal. It reads, 'Permission No.4 for Group Admission to Special Workshop'.

10431.name: Tully's Copper Medal
10431.description: Small, shiny copper medal. It reads, 'Permission No.5 for Group Admission to Special Workshop'.

10434.name: Icarus Sawsword - Focus
10434.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 111. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus

10435.name: Icarus Sawsword - Health
10435.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Health

10436.name: Icarus Sawsword - Light
10436.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases weight gauge by 20%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

10437.name: Icarus Heavy Arms - Focus
10437.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 111. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus

10438.name: Icarus Heavy Arms - Health
10438.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Health

10439.name: Icarus Heavy Arms - Light
10439.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases weight gauge by 20%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

10440.name: Icarus Spirit - Acumen
10440.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Casting Spd. by 15%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Acumen

10441.name: Icarus Spirit - Mana Up
10441.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 30%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Mana Up

10442.name: Icarus Spirit - Conversion
10442.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 60% and decreases Max HP by 40%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Conversion

10443.name: Icarus Spitter - Cheap Shot
10443.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Decreases MP Consumption 4% during a skill attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

10444.name: Icarus Spitter - Guidance
10444.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Accuracy by 5.32. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Guidance

10445.name: Icarus Spitter - Focus
10445.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 116. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus

10446.name: Icarus Disperser - Focus
10446.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 116. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus

10447.name: Icarus Disperser - Evasion
10447.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Evasion by 5. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Evasion

10448.name: Icarus Disperser - Critical Damage
10448.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases P. Atk. by 559 on a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Critical Damage

10449.name: Icarus Trident - Anger
10449.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Decreases HP by 15% while increasing P. Atk. by 78 during a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Anger

10450.name: Icarus Trident - Critical Stun
10450.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. There is a 48% chance that Stun effect is applied on a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

10451.name: Icarus Trident - Light
10451.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases weight gauge by 20%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

10452.name: Icarus Hammer - Anger
10452.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Decreases HP by 15% while increasing P. Atk. by 78 during a critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Anger

10453.name: Icarus Hammer - Health
10453.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Health

10454.name: Icarus Hammer - Rsk. Focus
10454.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 164 when HP drops to 60% or lower. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Rsk. Focus

10455.name: Icarus Hall - Mana Up
10455.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 30%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Mana Up

10456.name: Icarus Hall - Conversion
10456.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 60% and decreases Max HP by 40%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Conversion

10457.name: Icarus Hall - Acumen
10457.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Casting Spd. by 15%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Acumen

10458.name: Icarus Hand - Rsk. Evasion
10458.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Evasion by 6.8 when HP drops to 60% or lower. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Rsk. Evasion

10459.name: Icarus Hand - Focus
10459.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases critical attack by 106. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus

10460.name: Icarus Hand - Haste
10460.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by 10%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Haste

10461.name: Icarus Stinger - Focus
10461.description: Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Icarus Sawsword Conversion. <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Critical Attack is increased by 111. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. When enchanted to 4 or more, it has a chance of increasing P. Atk., M. Atk., and healing power, and of decreaseing MP consumption for skill use for you and your party members during a critical attack. Special Ability: Focus

10462.name: Icarus Stinger - Health
10462.description: Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Icarus Sawsword Conversion. <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. When enchanted to 4 or more, it has a chance of increasing P. Atk., M. Atk., and healing power, and of decreaseing MP consumption for skill use for you and your party members during a critical attack. Special Ability: Health

10463.name: Icarus Stinger - Light
10463.description: Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Icarus Sawsword Conversion. <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases weight gauge by 20%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP.enchanted to . 4 or more, there is a chance that party members including yourself will get increased P. Atk., M. Atk., and the amount of recieved heal, and decreased MP consumption per skill during a critical attack. Special Ability: PvP Damage

10464.name: Icarus Wingblade - Focus
10464.description: Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Icarus Heavy Arms Conversion. <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Critical Attack is increased by 111. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus

10465.name: Icarus Wingblade - Health
10465.description: Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Icarus Heavy Arms Conversion. <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Health

10466.name: Icarus Wingblade - Light
10466.description: Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Icarus Heavy Arms Conversion. <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases weight gauge by 20%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

10467.name: Icarus Shooter - Cheap Shot
10467.description: Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Icarus Spitter Conversion. <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Decreased MP consumption by 12% when a skill is used. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

10468.name: Icarus Shooter - Guidance
10468.description: Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Icarus Spitter Conversion. <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. The Accuracy is increased by 5.32. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Guidance

10469.name: Icarus Shooter - Focus
10469.description: Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Icarus Spitter Conversion. <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Critical Attack is increased by 116. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus

10470.name: Shadow Item - Red Crescent
10470.description: This item cannot be exchanged or dropped.

10471.name: Shadow Item - Ring of Devotion
10471.description: This item cannot be exchanged or dropped.

10472.name: Shadow Item - Necklace of Devotion
10472.description: This item cannot be exchanged or dropped.

10473.name: Magic Accessory Set
10473.description: Obtain this Shadow Item by double-clicking. It cannot be exchanged or dropped. Magic Defence Toolkit for beginners

10474.name: Shadow Item - Apprentice's Staff
10474.description: Apprentice Adventurer's Staff. A Shadow Item which cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized or enchanted. Chaotic characters are not allowed to use it.

10475.name: Shadow Item - Bone Club
10475.description: Apprentice Adventurer's Bone Club. A Shadow Item which cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized or enchanted. Chaotic characters are not allowed to use it.

10476.name: Shadow Item - Shining Knife
10476.description: Apprentice Adventurer's Knife. A Shadow Item which cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized or enchanted. Chaotic characters are not allowed to use it.

10477.name: Shadow Item - Cestus
10477.description: Apprentice Adventurer's Cestus. A Shadow Item which cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized or enchanted. Chaotic characters are not allowed to use it.

10478.name: Shadow Item - Forest Bow
10478.description: Apprentice Adventurer's Bow. A Shadow Item which cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized or enchanted. Chaotic characters are not allowed to use it.

10479.name: Shadow Item - Long Sword
10479.description: Apprentice Adventurer's Long Sword. A Shadow Item which cannot be exchanged, dropped, crystallized or enchanted. Chaotic characters are not allowed to use it.

10480.name: Red Soul Crystal - Stage 15
10480.description: Red Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 15. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters. Soul Crystal

10481.name: Blue Soul Crystal - Stage 15
10481.description: Blue Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 15. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters. Soul Crystal

10482.name: Green Soul Crystal - Stage 15
10482.description: Green Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 15. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters. Soul Crystal

10483.name: Life Stone - Level 82
10483.description: General mineral created when a stone in a monster is solidified by a physical or magic hit. Usable by characters level 82 and above when augmenting weapons.

10484.name: Mid-Grade Life Stone - Level 82
10484.description: Mid-Grade mineral created when a stone in a monster is solidified by a physical or magic hit. Usable by characters level 82 and above when augmenting weapons.

10485.name: High-Grade Life Stone - Level 82
10485.description: High-Grade mineral created when a stone in a monster is solidified by a physical or magic hit. Usable by characters level 82 and above when augmenting weapons.

10486.name: Top-Grade Life Stone - Level 82
10486.description: Top-Grade mineral created when a stone in a monster is solidified by a physical or magic hit. Usable by characters level 82 and above when augmenting weapons.

10487.name: Dynasty Jeweled Leather Armor - Force Master
10487.description: Duelist and Grand Khavatari can wear it.

10488.name: Dynasty Jeweled Leather Armor - Weapon Master
10488.description: Dreadnought, Titan, Fortune Seeker, Maestro, Doombringer and Soul Hound can wear it.

10489.name: Dynasty Jeweled Leather Armor - Enchanter
10489.description: Hierophant, Dominator, Doom Cryer and Judicator can wear it.

10490.name: Dynasty Jeweled Leather Armor - Summoner
10490.description: Arcana Lord, Elemental Master and Spectral Master can wear it.

10491.name: Silk Shirt - HP
10491.description: Increases Max HP by 118 when strengthened by 4 or more.

10492.name: Silk Shirt - MP
10492.description: Increases Max MP by 51 when strengthened by 4 or more.

10493.name: Silk Shirt - CP
10493.description: Increases Max CP by 354 when strengthened by 4 or more.

10494.name: Thin Leather Shirt - HP
10494.description: Increases Max HP by 147 when strengthened by 4 or more.

10495.name: Thin Leather Shirt - MP
10495.description: Increases Max MP by 72 when strengthened by 4 or more.

10496.name: Thin Leather Shirt - CP
10496.description: Increases Max CP by 441 when strengthened by 4 or more.

10497.name: Scale Shirt - HP
10497.description: Increases Max HP by 172 when strengthened by 4 or more.

10498.name: Scale Shirt - MP
10498.description: Increases Max MP by 85 when strengthened by 4 or more.

10499.name: Scale Shirt - CP
10499.description: Increases Max CP by 516 when strengthened by 4 or more.
